Shaman Armor

Shaman Armor is the class-specific armor obtained by using an Armor Kit on any regular armor for the Shaman subclass in Remixed Dungeon. It is a variant of Elf Armor with the same visual appearance and special properties.

Acquisition

  • Use an Armor Kit on any regular armor while playing as an Elf who has chosen the Shaman subclass
  • Transforms the base armor into Shaman Armor with special properties
  • Armor Kit is typically obtained by defeating the King boss on level 15 of the City

Special Properties

  • Inherits all properties of Elf Armor
  • Has a helmet that covers the hair
  • Exclusive to the Shaman subclass - cannot be equipped if not the Shaman subclass
  • When equipped by non-Shaman subclass, displays message: “This armor can only be worn by a shaman.”

Usage

  • Essential armor for maximizing the effectiveness of the Shaman subclass
  • Should be crafted as soon as possible after choosing the Shaman subclass
  • Allows full utilization of subclass abilities

Technical Details

  • Java Class: com.watabou.pixeldungeon.items.armor.ShamanArmor
  • Inheritance: Extends ElfArmor class
  • Implementation: Uses the same image as Elf Armor (image index 19)

Notes

  • Part of the subclass identity system in Remixed Dungeon
  • Class armors represent the unique nature of each subclass
  • Cannot be worn by characters who haven't unlocked the appropriate subclass
  • Inherits the base Elf armor properties

See Also

  • Shaman Subclass
  • Armor Kit
  • Elf Class
